name: Pasta fredda

ingredients: (50 g) feta cheese (or other solid but crumbly cheeses)
(125 g) cherry tomatoes, fresh, candied or roasted. In halves.

instructions: For the candied cherry tomatoes toss them with some salt, pepper and olive oil, (optional, oregano, sugar, garlic powder) roasting in the oven at 135ÂºC (no convection) for 2h.
variants: Soaked (in water, to remove raw taste) red onion, or green
Fresh herbs like basil, ruccula (rocket), green onions...
Substitute feta for non-crumbly cheeses like mozzarella.

culinary: If preparing the pasta for later, add half the pesto now, half later. Do it the night before to allow it to cool. Add a tsp of mayonnaise or oil to prevent drying.
Italians say pasta starts dying the moment you drain it. You have to put in the sauce quickly.
